name: Weather-app
tagline: Weather App allows other developers have an easy and orderly way to get weather data info around the world using two different web service.
body:
Hello , My name is Hila, I'm student .

The Weather App is avilable libary written in c# which is a wrapper libary for working with restful web services,
I choose 2 web services that supply weather data info :
1.http://www.openweathermap.org/api
2.http://www.worldweatheronline.com/api/

The main goal of the libary is to help developers with working with restful web services, instead to work directly with the web service ,you can use the weather-app to do it for you :)

I upload the Weather-App to git, you can find it here:
https://github.com/hilatashtash/Weather-App
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
